budget_activity_title: Pay And Allowances Of Enlisted Personnel
explanation: Funds are required for the following programs due to the current execution rates of enlisted pay that will exceed the budget level after the Aug ATR implementation.
Funds are available in the programs listed below. Â© $-9.353 million in Basic Allowance for Subsistence (BAS) due to fewer members entitled to this allowance than the budgeted levels.

Funds are early to need for the National Technical Nuclear Forensics United States Prompt Diagnostic System program due to delayed installs of terrestrial-based sensors and communications at multiple sites. Each site requires a Memorandum of Agreement (MOA) and delays in the MOAs have caused installations of the equipment to move to future years. The re-phasing of the funding will be addressed in a future budget submission. There are no other known program requirements for the funding at this time and no major impacts to the program!
